channel.title: Paladious 317 - 5 floor dung/100% Summon/Hunter - PVM/ECO
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.paladious.com/AD/Paladious-banner-1.png[/img]
[b][url=http://www.paladious.com]www.paladious.com[/url][/b]
[url=http://www.paladious.com][img]http://www.paladious.com/AD/website.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.paladious.com/play.php][img]http://www.paladious.com/AD/play.png[/img][/url]
Paladious is PVM focused server with very detailed skilling. We dont have any skills you need to constantly click. Every skill is cycled from make1 to make x amount. Minigames are more detailed then any other server.
[size=14pt][u][b]Bosses[/b][/u][/size]
[i][b]Tormented demons Corporeal beast Revenants Bandows godwars Armadyl godwars Zamorak godwars Saradomin godwars Bork & chaos tunnels Barrelchest King black dragon Strykewyrms Penace queen Chaos elemental[/b][/i] [b] [size=14pt][color=red][u][b]Minigames[/b][/u][/color][/size] [color=green] Treasure trail (easy, med, hard) Duel arena Fighting pits Fight caves (6 or 63 waves) Barrows (full)[/color]
[size=14pt][color=red][u][b]Skills[/b][/u][/color][/size] [color=green] 100% Summoning, nothing else to add lol... Complete Dungeoneering token shop - 3 Floors - 7 Bosses All implings All butterflys Lootable impling jars Cycle based bone on altar, offer 1, 5, X, All All ancient/normal combat spells Most lunar spells -Superheat ores All functioning 317 rc altars Xp per used essence Perfect multiple runes per ess Fully functioning runecrafting pouches Full gnome course Ticket per complete lap Ticket exchange Lap prestige bonus Full cycle based herblore mix 1,5,10,x,all. full unfinished potion mixing Extreme potion mixing Overload mixing Random events when thieving Master farmer pickpocketing Different thieve chests to train on Cycle based hide crafting Cycle based make 1,5,10,x,all. Cycle based gem cutting to amulets Cycle based arrow making Cycle based bow fletching Cycle based stringing Cycle based feathering Cycle based make 1,5,10,x,all Most common 317 mining rocks Cycle based mining Speed boost per level & pick type Rocks running out Most common 317 fishing spots Rocktail fishing Cooking on fire All fishes cookable Cycle based cooking Cook 1,5,10,all options Successfull cooking rate per level Stop burning on goal level Clipped firemaking All logs possible to light Perfect light success ratio and timers Most trees cuttable Bird nest events Cutting speed according to axe type Cutting speed according to level Tree stumps Patch raking Patch watering All 317 herb seeds[/color]
- AND MUCH MUCH MORE - Check new pictures![/b]
[img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/JDUdQ.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/WjS0y.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/9w5gr.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/L1OV2.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/ah1yO.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/vj4EM.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/9V0QF.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/R2i8T.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/6Or3j.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/yG5RJ.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/EbF6d.png[/img] [img]http://img.sleeksnap.com/6aN1r.png[/img] [IMG]http://img.sleeksnap.com/4BJSz.png[/img] [img]http://paladious.com/images/bandos.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.com/images/corp.jpg[/img] [img]http://paladious.com/images/dbow.bmp[/img] [/center]

item.title: Paladious 317 - 5 floor dung/100% Summon/Hunter - PVM/ECO
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

I had high hopes for this server especially with an actual competent owner.

Some good, some bad choices were made overall in the month I played.

If you just want to play a server that actually has an active owner who fixes stuff when bug reports are posted…this is for you.

If you are like me though you need more than just that you need somebody who understands how an economy really works and what ti takes. Some of the recent updates that have been announced to happen will absolutely destroy what little of an eco this server actually had. I, for one, refuse to stand around and watch what I was involved with just crumble from below my very feet.

[hr]

So yeah there are my thoughts.

Read full topic

item.title: Paladious 317 - 5 floor dung/100% Summon/Hunter - PVM/ECO
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:9, topic:513592”][quote author=rs614 link=topic=631838.msg4275936#msg4275936 date=1364949323]

Doesn’t appear to have any malicious intent however their play.php page is encrypted for some weird reason, after playing just run some form of virus scan on your computer and that’ll tell you for sure, or run the file using a sand box. Innocent until proven otherwise is the term, I think.

Hehe, nothing malicious there, it was encrypted first cause of webclient. bastards downloaded jar and came online with reflection client. Spawned trees and stuff all over the place. Had exe client for a while, then had to change.
Keytool there is from jaring. I forgot to change cache auto download link and had to jar new client in hurry. Forgot to delete keytool from signing that jar, and kept bat for those who been playing around with winrar and cant run jars for some reason.
Page encryption has been removed since its not needed, client has been reuploaded.
Client classes and methods are renamed to stop retards coming online with reflection.

Never mind, got to restore page without encryption… lost original page.
[/quote]
I had a few reports of people saying it was malicious so I thought I’d check just incase :P.

Good luck.[/quote]

Ty. Any questions, ask. I can share open source, original page…etc. Or link what i used to encrypt with. Panic over keytool in client folder just shows how little java knowlage some users here has.

Read full topic

item.title: Paladious 317 - 5 floor dung/100% Summon/Hunter - PVM/ECO
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“rs614, post:8, topic:513592”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=631838.msg4275924#msg4275924 date=1364948768]

Doesn’t appear to have any malicious intent however their play.php page is encrypted for some weird reason, after playing just run some form of virus scan on your computer and that’ll tell you for sure, or run the file using a sand box. Innocent until proven otherwise is the term, I think.
[/quote]

Hehe, nothing malicious there, it was encrypted first cause of webclient. bastards downloaded jar and came online with reflection client. Spawned trees and stuff all over the place. Had exe client for a while, then had to change.
Keytool there is from jaring. I forgot to change cache auto download link and had to jar new client in hurry. Forgot to delete keytool from signing that jar, and kept bat for those who been playing around with winrar and cant run jars for some reason.
Page encryption has been removed since its not needed, client has been reuploaded.
Client classes and methods are renamed to stop retards coming online with reflection.

Never mind, got to restore page without encryption… lost original page.[/quote]
I had a few reports of people saying it was malicious so I thought I’d check just incase :P.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Paladious 317 - 5 floor dung/100% Summon/Hunter - PVM/ECO
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:7, topic:513592”][quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=631838.msg4275836#msg4275836 date=1364943125]

[/quote]
Doesn’t appear to have any malicious intent however their play.php page is encrypted for some weird reason, after playing just run some form of virus scan on your computer and that’ll tell you for sure, or run the file using a sand box. Innocent until proven otherwise is the term, I think.[/quote]

Hehe, nothing malicious there, it was encrypted first cause of webclient. bastards downloaded jar and came online with reflection client. Spawned trees and stuff all over the place. Had exe client for a while, then had to change.
Keytool there is from jaring. I forgot to change cache auto download link and had to jar new client in hurry. Forgot to delete keytool from signing that jar, and kept bat for those who been playing around with winrar and cant run jars for some reason.
Page encryption has been removed since its not needed, client has been reuploaded.
Client classes and methods are renamed to stop retards coming online with reflection.

Never mind, got to restore page without encryption… lost original page. Ill explain again why i have it encrypted just in case. I used to have executive client and webclient. Webclient page was encrypted to stop jar download for rookies. Encrypted page hide main class and jar adress. Client was refactored to stop reflection clients beeing attached to it. As far as i could tell, it worked. After all that trouble i didnt see any webs or random trees in server anymore. Downside was that executive client was really not very trusted download, and it didnt work for mac and other weird name OS. So i had to switch back to jar. If any staff member wants, i can share open source client just for checks.

Read full topic

item.title: Paladious 317 - 5 floor dung/100% Summon/Hunter - PVM/ECO
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Cruel Truth:

Doesn’t appear to have any malicious intent however their play.php page is encrypted for some weird reason, after playing just run some form of virus scan on your computer and that’ll tell you for sure, or run the file using a sand box. Innocent until proven otherwise is the term, I think.

Read full topic

item.title: Paladious 317 - 5 floor dung/100% Summon/Hunter - PVM/ECO
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:5, topic:513592”]Overall I like the premium system however I do have a couple of suggestions

  1. add a limitation on what you can “pay over” to not require a monthly payment. From what I read in the f.a.q. it says paraphrased

“for $5 you are a premium member for a month”
“premium membership of anything over $5 is permanent.”

By that logic $5.01 is permanent

[hr]

Also, I suggest showing some pictures of the credit shops and maybe a list of what items cost in it credit wise cause a person may just want to buy a specific amount of credits.

besides that looks like a solid base good luck

[hr]

what?

[/quote]

Crap, forgot. It was originally 30 days, but changed to permenent. Forgot to change it in forums.
And thanks for showing client lol, forgot to remove bat and keytool.

Allso about that premium. Afterall, we host rsps. Asking over $2 for premium or member , however we call it, is sin. Players usually quit after month-two. So heres when that permenent and monthly comes handy. If you wanna try out, you try for $2. Amount is small and even if you regreat it later, loss is minimal. But if you like what you get for it, you can add just some extra and have it permenetly.
Thanks for suggestions, client and typos fixed.

Read full topic

@Cruel_Truth wrote:

Overall I like the premium system however I do have a couple of suggestions

  1. add a limitation on what you can “pay over” to not require a monthly payment. From what I read in the f.a.q. it says paraphrased

“for $5 you are a premium member for a month”
“premium membership of anything over $5 is permanent.”

By that logic $5.01 is permanent

[hr]

Also, I suggest showing some pictures of the credit shops and maybe a list of what items cost in it credit wise cause a person may just want to buy a specific amount of credits.

besides that looks like a solid base good luck

item.title: Paladious 317 - 5 floor dung/100% Summon/Hunter - PVM/ECO
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

Soulcist:

The advertisement isn’t so bad, but as far as the server itself - I suppose it could keep someone entertained for a while, not sure.

Yea, server was released today morning, and bugs are just showing up after fixes, more content coming.
But when it comes to content like gambling, weird minigames and 50k customs… not gonna happen. I will never ever add any feature that compromises stability or makes server look messy. Server right now is very clean, uses under 100k memory while having really detailed skilling and combat.
Thanks for comments

Read full topic
